newsitem.title: USA: Cooper Industries Inc Q3 share rises.
newsitem.headline: Cooper Industries Inc Q3 share rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: 1995 nine months net earnings include $186.6 million charge for discontinued operations.
1995 nine months net earnings per share from continuing operations were $1.83 on a primary basis and $1.76 on a fully diluted basis.

The company said it realized an after-tax gain of $66 million from the sale of securities during the third quarter, but the gain was offset entirely by a non-recurring charge in the automotive segment and had no impact on Q3 earnings.

Diluted EPS calculation assumes conversion of 7.05 percent convertible subordinated debentures to common stock. As a result, interest on the debentures ($7.3 million for Q3) was added back to net income in the computation of diluted EPS.
First Call mean estimate for Q3 was $0.67/shr.
